message.content: "Given the following text, please extract all instances of the specified entities. The entities to look for are [Entity 1, Entity 2, ...]. The text is as follows: [Text]. Please format your response as a list, with each item representing an extracted entity and its context within the text."

"Given the following text, please identify and extract all instances of the specified entities. The entities to look for are [Entity 1, Entity 2, Entity 3]. The text is as follows: [Insert Text Here]. Please format your response as a list, with each extracted entity on a new line."

"Given the following text and a list of entities, please extract all instances of these entities from the text. The entities are [entity1, entity2, ...]. The text is as follows: [text]. Please format your response as a list, with each item representing an entity and its occurrences in the text."
